short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block job postings from specific companies on LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block job posts based on company. This extension helps you avoid spam posts, staffing agencies, scams, jobs from companies you don't want to see, etc. cleaning up your job postings and pushing forward posts you want to see. 
LinkedIn aggressively refreshes and reloads the DOM. If 'Block' button not visible, refresh page.
